description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Considérations géographiques sur l'histoire du Brésil. Examen d'une nouvelle histoire générale du Brésil récemment publiée ... par M. François-Adolphe de Varnhagen ... Rapport fait à la Société de Géographie de Paris, etc. (Extrait du Bulletin de la Société de Géographie.) [With maps.]" Author: AVEZAC-MACAYA, Marie Armand Pascal d'. Contributor: VARNHAGEN, Francisco Adolfo de - Viscount de Porto Seguro Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10481.g.16." Page: 285 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1857 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000151889 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
